testcase.classname: As a user I want to check Home Page functionality
testcase.name: Verify Language Selection Functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Home page is open.....................................................passed Given The modal is closed...................................................passed When I click on the "ENG" button............................................passed And I select a "Arm" language...............................................passed Then I see that the page URL should be contain the "/am"....................passed
